Can you make this `half_le` instead of `ge_half`? seems `one_half` might be the more standard name
Yes (--> `one_half_le_sum_primes_ge_one_div`). I thought the `â‰¥` version was a more natural statement, but using `â‰¤` leads to some (minor) simplification.

This seems quite annoying to maintain as the ring_nf output could randomly change. Can you spell out the equality you want
like
```
rw [show a * b = b * a by ring] at this
```
